settings.title: Settings
settings.nearbyShareEnabledDesc: Enable quick file sharing on this network
settings.resetSettingsDesc: Reset all settings to the default values

login.title: Log In
login.historyDesc: All your transfers using the app will be saved on a history for easy access and management
login.syncDesc: Your transfer history will be synced across all devices using your account to keep it up to date
login.identificationDesc: When people receive files from you, your name will be displayed along the transfer (must be enabled on the account settings)

dialog.unknownDesc: An unknown error occurred in the app or while trying to reach the server, this likely happened cause you're running an outdated version of SkyShare. Please make sure you're running the latest version and try again.
dialog.downDesc: Unable to reach the SkyShare server, please check your internet connection and try again.
dialog.offlineDesc: SkyShare could not reach the internet, make sure you're online and have a stable connection.
dialog.disabledDesc: An operation is currently running, are you sure you want to close SkyShare?
dialog.tooManyFilesDesc: The maximum number of files has been exceeded! You can only send a maximum of {{amount}} files per transfer.
dialog.addingErrorDesc: An error occurred while adding {{amount}} of the selected files, check if they still exist and if their name is unique.
dialog.invalidCodeDesc: This code is not associated to an ongoing transfer. Please double-check it and try again.
nearbyShareDesc: With this feature enabled, when you have the receive page open, your device will be discovered by other people on the same network.
When someone on your network is sending files, a list of people with the NearbyShare feature on will be shown providing quick transfers without the need of sharing the transfer code.
Your info will not be shared on the network unless you have a SkyShare account and you opt-in using the "Show my info" switch.
dialog.noUpdatesDesc: You already have the latest version of SkyShare. That's great news!
betaUpdatesDesc: Are you sure you want to enable this setting? Beta updates are unstable and can break your user experience.
You will have to restart SkyShare for this setting to be applied.
dialog.resetSettingsDesc: Are you sure you want to reset all settings? The default values will be applied.
